attributes.action: Close all construction sites to stop the spread of corronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: The government need to shut all construction site. Guidelines set out by public health are not working and cannot be maintained due to over crowded sites and Manor of works being undertaken on a daily basis. Ppe that needs to be provided to all personnel to keep safe is not available due to demand of the NHS. PLEASE SHUT DOWN BEFORE ITS TO LATE
attributes.background: Shut all construction sites immediately and stop the spread of corronavirus and save the lives of people who build this country. Help protect these vulnerable individuals who are being forced to work instead of staying home save the NHS and save lives just like the government are saying.
